As part of the contract, it steals the soul."},{"lineNumber":46456,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それも死後に、じゃない。契約遂行後すぐに、だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"And not after death. It happens immediately after the contract's fulfillment.\""},{"lineNumber":46457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、魂が奪われるって事は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, if the soul is stolen then that means...\""},{"lineNumber":46458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、死ぬと考えとけばいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, you can think of it as dying."},{"lineNumber":46459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その後どうなるかは……その悪魔次第だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"What happens afterwards... depends on that demon.\""},{"lineNumber":46460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それ、できるのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Can it really do that?"},{"lineNumber":46461,"originalJapaneseLine":"　フェリスが無理だって言ってたぞ、確か」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm pretty sure Ferris said it's impossible.\""},{"lineNumber":46462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハグレだからね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because it's a renegade,"},{"lineNumber":46463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪魔本来のルールはお構いなしさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"it doesn't care about the original rules of demons.\""},{"lineNumber":46464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、マジック・ザ・ガンジーは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, Magic the Ganji is...?"},{"lineNumber":46465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待て待て。マジックは何ともなかったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, wait. Nothing happened to Magic.\""},{"lineNumber":46466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数字はなかったかい？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was there no number?"},{"lineNumber":46467,"originalJapaneseLine":"　新王のお嬢ちゃんの周り、身体……その辺だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Around the new queen's daughter, her body... somewhere there.\""},{"lineNumber":46468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういえば、あったような……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now that you mention it, I think there was something...?\""},{"lineNumber":46469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが寿命さ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's the lifespan."},{"lineNumber":46470,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その日数が過ぎると、魂はあいつの物。","translatedEnglishLine":"Once those days pass, the soul belongs to that guy."},{"lineNumber":46471,"originalJapaneseLine":"　転生することもなく、永遠にオモチャだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It won't reincarnate; it'll be his toy forever.\""},{"lineNumber":46472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どこかに行った、って事は追加の契約かね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it went somewhere, that means an additional contract, right?"},{"lineNumber":46473,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少なくとも、奴が新王の魂にツバ付けてるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"At the very least, there's no doubt it has set its sights on the new queen's soul."},{"lineNumber":46474,"originalJapaneseLine":"　間違いはないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":46475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬぬぬ。って事はマジックは死ぬのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmmm. So that means Magic will die."},{"lineNumber":46476,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そいつはいかん。首都だったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"That can't be allowed. Was it the capital?"},{"lineNumber":46477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「宮殿の地下に、迷宮がある。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's a labyrinth beneath the palace."},{"lineNumber":46478,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その片隅に、あの契約の椅子はある」","translatedEnglishLine":"In a corner of it lies that contract chair.\""},{"lineNumber":46479,"originalJapaneseLine":"「宮殿の地下迷宮、ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The underground labyrinth of the palace, right?"},{"lineNumber":46480,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……もしかして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... could it be,"},{"lineNumber":46481,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昔、ランス様をお助けするときに使った……」","translatedEnglishLine":"the one we used when helping Lord Rance back then...?"},{"lineNumber":46482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おぉ。カミーラの唇を奪ってやった時か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh. That was when you stole Camilla's lips.\""},{"lineNumber":46483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………そんな事をしていたのですか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............So you were doing such things, Lord Rance...?"},{"lineNumber":46484,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":46485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん。とにかく、そこに行ったんだな？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. Anyway, you went there, right?"},{"lineNumber":46486,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっさと追いかけるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's hurry and follow.\""},{"lineNumber":46487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ま、待って！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait!"},{"lineNumber":46488,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ラグナロックアークに、ってどうやって？","translatedEnglishLine":"How are we supposed to get to Ragnarok Ark?"},{"lineNumber":46489,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あそこ、今……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's now...!"},{"lineNumber":46490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、魔人の方たちが……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The demons are there...!"},{"lineNumber":46491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でも、じゃあマジック様は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but then how did Lord Magic..."},{"lineNumber":46492,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうやって……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...get there?\""},{"lineNumber":46493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":46494,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザが、しばし顎に指を当てた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Uruza placed a finger on his chin for a moment."},{"lineNumber":46495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……スライム迷宮ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...The Slime Labyrinth, isn't it?"},{"lineNumber":46496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は？　なんだそりゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What's that?"},{"lineNumber":46497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「四天王の塔の内、北西に位置する王者の塔。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's the King's Tower located northwest among the Four Heavenly Kings Towers."},{"lineNumber":46498,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その近くにある迷宮です」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a labyrinth nearby."},{"lineNumber":46499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あそこはまだ、ぎりぎり魔軍の勢力圏外ですし、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just barely outside the demon army's territory,"},{"lineNumber":46500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ラグナロックアークへの転移装置があります」","translatedEnglishLine":"and there's a teleportation device to Ragnarok Ark there."},{"lineNumber":46501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王族が緊急時に脱出するためのものですから、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's meant for the royal family to escape in emergencies,"},{"lineNumber":46502,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジック様もご存じのはずです。恐らくは、ここへ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so Lord Magic certainly knows about it. Probably that's where he went..."},{"lineNumber":46503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、北西という事は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But northwest means..."},{"lineNumber":46504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メディウサ軍の勢力圏内を、大きく迂回することになりますね。","translatedEnglishLine":"he'd have to make a large detour through Medusa's army territory."},{"lineNumber":46505,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに出た方が良いと思います」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think we should leave immediately.\""},{"lineNumber":46506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、流石はウルザちゃんだ。出撃するぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, as expected of Uruza-chan. Let's deploy!\""},{"lineNumber":46507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「急ぐんだね。奴は契約と称して","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We must hurry. That guy calls it a contract,"},{"lineNumber":46508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相手を騙すのを何とも思っちゃいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"but he feels nothing about deceiving others."},{"lineNumber":46509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　困った人間につけこむのなんて十八番さ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Preying on troubled humans is his specialty.\""},{"lineNumber":46510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……パセリの、ようにな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...just like Parsley.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それだけでも珍しいよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's rare enough by itself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレはね、ゼス王家の女性としか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That one only makes contracts with women of the Zess royal family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約しない奴でね」
「女性と、だけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Only with women...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。契約として、魂を奪う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. As part of the contract, it steals the soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも死後に、じゃない。契約遂行後すぐに、だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And not after death. It happens immediately after the contract's fulfillment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、魂が奪われるって事は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, if the soul is stolen then that means..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、死ぬと考えとけばいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you can think of it as dying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後どうなるかは……その悪魔次第だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happens afterwards... depends on that demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それ、できるのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Can it really do that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスが無理だって言ってたぞ、確か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm pretty sure Ferris said it's impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハグレだからね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because it's a renegade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔本来のルールはお構いなしさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't care about the original rules of demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、マジック・ザ・ガンジーは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, Magic the Ganji is...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待て待て。マジックは何ともなかったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, wait. Nothing happened to Magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数字はなかったかい？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was there no number?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新王のお嬢ちゃんの周り、身体……その辺だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around the new queen's daughter, her body... somewhere there."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば、あったような……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it, I think there was something...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが寿命さ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's the lifespan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その日数が過ぎると、魂はあいつの物。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once those days pass, the soul belongs to that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転生することもなく、永遠にオモチャだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't reincarnate; it'll be his toy forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこかに行った、って事は追加の契約かね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it went somewhere, that means an additional contract, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくとも、奴が新王の魂にツバ付けてるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the very least, there's no doubt it has set its sights on the new queen's soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いはないよ」
「ぬぬぬ。って事はマジックは死ぬのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmmm. So that means Magic will die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつはいかん。首都だったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That can't be allowed. Was it the capital?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宮殿の地下に、迷宮がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's a labyrinth beneath the palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その片隅に、あの契約の椅子はある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a corner of it lies that contract chair."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宮殿の地下迷宮、ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The underground labyrinth of the palace, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ……もしかして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... could it be,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔、ランス様をお助けするときに使った……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the one we used when helping Lord Rance back then...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おぉ。カミーラの唇を奪ってやった時か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. That was when you stole Camilla's lips."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「………………そんな事をしていたのですか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "............So you were doing such things, Lord Rance...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様……」
「ふん。とにかく、そこに行ったんだな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. Anyway, you went there, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと追いかけるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's hurry and follow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ま、待って！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-wait!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークに、ってどうやって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How are we supposed to get to Ragnarok Ark?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこ、今……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's now...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、魔人の方たちが……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demons are there...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、でも、じゃあマジック様は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but then how did Lord Magic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやって……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...get there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザが、しばし顎に指を当てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uruza placed a finger on his chin for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……スライム迷宮ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The Slime Labyrinth, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は？　なんだそりゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What's that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四天王の塔の内、北西に位置する王者の塔。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's the King's Tower located northwest among the Four Heavenly Kings Towers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その近くにある迷宮です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a labyrinth nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこはまだ、ぎりぎり魔軍の勢力圏外ですし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just barely outside the demon army's territory,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークへの転移装置があります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there's a teleportation device to Ragnarok Ark there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王族が緊急時に脱出するためのものですから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's meant for the royal family to escape in emergencies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック様もご存じのはずです。恐らくは、ここへ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so Lord Magic certainly knows about it. Probably that's where he went...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、北西という事は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But northwest means...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メディウサ軍の勢力圏内を、大きく迂回することになりますね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he'd have to make a large detour through Medusa's army territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに出た方が良いと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think we should leave immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、流石はウルザちゃんだ。出撃するぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, as expected of Uruza-chan. Let's deploy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「急ぐんだね。奴は契約と称して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We must hurry. That guy calls it a contract,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手を騙すのを何とも思っちゃいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he feels nothing about deceiving others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困った人間につけこむのなんて十八番さ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Preying on troubled humans is his specialty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……パセリの、ようにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...just like Parsley."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それだけでも珍しいよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's rare enough by itself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレはね、ゼス王家の女性としか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That one only makes contracts with women of the Zess royal family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約しない奴でね」
「女性と、だけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Only with women...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。契約として、魂を奪う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. As part of the contract, it steals the soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも死後に、じゃない。契約遂行後すぐに、だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And not after death. It happens immediately after the contract's fulfillment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、魂が奪われるって事は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, if the soul is stolen then that means..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、死ぬと考えとけばいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you can think of it as dying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後どうなるかは……その悪魔次第だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happens afterwards... depends on that demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それ、できるのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Can it really do that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスが無理だって言ってたぞ、確か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm pretty sure Ferris said it's impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハグレだからね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because it's a renegade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔本来のルールはお構いなしさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it doesn't care about the original rules of demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、マジック・ザ・ガンジーは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, Magic the Ganji is...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待て待て。マジックは何ともなかったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, wait. Nothing happened to Magic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数字はなかったかい？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was there no number?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新王のお嬢ちゃんの周り、身体……その辺だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around the new queen's daughter, her body... somewhere there."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば、あったような……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it, I think there was something...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが寿命さ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's the lifespan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その日数が過ぎると、魂はあいつの物。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once those days pass, the soul belongs to that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転生することもなく、永遠にオモチャだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won't reincarnate; it'll be his toy forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どこかに行った、って事は追加の契約かね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it went somewhere, that means an additional contract, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくとも、奴が新王の魂にツバ付けてるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the very least, there's no doubt it has set its sights on the new queen's soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いはないよ」
「ぬぬぬ。って事はマジックは死ぬのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmmm. So that means Magic will die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつはいかん。首都だったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That can't be allowed. Was it the capital?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宮殿の地下に、迷宮がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's a labyrinth beneath the palace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その片隅に、あの契約の椅子はある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a corner of it lies that contract chair."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宮殿の地下迷宮、ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The underground labyrinth of the palace, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ……もしかして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... could it be,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔、ランス様をお助けするときに使った……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the one we used when helping Lord Rance back then...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おぉ。カミーラの唇を奪ってやった時か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. That was when you stole Camilla's lips."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「………………そんな事をしていたのですか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "............So you were doing such things, Lord Rance...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様……」
「ふん。とにかく、そこに行ったんだな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. Anyway, you went there, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと追いかけるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's hurry and follow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ま、待って！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-wait!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークに、ってどうやって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How are we supposed to get to Ragnarok Ark?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこ、今……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's now...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、魔人の方たちが……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demons are there...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、でも、じゃあマジック様は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but then how did Lord Magic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやって……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...get there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザが、しばし顎に指を当てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uruza placed a finger on his chin for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……スライム迷宮ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The Slime Labyrinth, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は？　なんだそりゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What's that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四天王の塔の内、北西に位置する王者の塔。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's the King's Tower located northwest among the Four Heavenly Kings Towers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その近くにある迷宮です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a labyrinth nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこはまだ、ぎりぎり魔軍の勢力圏外ですし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just barely outside the demon army's territory,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークへの転移装置があります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and there's a teleportation device to Ragnarok Ark there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王族が緊急時に脱出するためのものですから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's meant for the royal family to escape in emergencies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジック様もご存じのはずです。恐らくは、ここへ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so Lord Magic certainly knows about it. Probably that's where he went...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、北西という事は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But northwest means...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メディウサ軍の勢力圏内を、大きく迂回することになりますね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he'd have to make a large detour through Medusa's army territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに出た方が良いと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think we should leave immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、流石はウルザちゃんだ。出撃するぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, as expected of Uruza-chan. Let's deploy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「急ぐんだね。奴は契約と称して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We must hurry. That guy calls it a contract,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相手を騙すのを何とも思っちゃいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he feels nothing about deceiving others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困った人間につけこむのなんて十八番さ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Preying on troubled humans is his specialty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……パセリの、ようにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...just like Parsley."
